+myConnections: Engage your community - connect to news, events and information you care about.    View more information...

  • Sign In

Welcome to an Engaged Community

There's a better way to personalize your website experience. With myConnection, the profile you create allows you to set up a unique starting point for the tasks and transactions that you want to complete in your time on this website. Use myConnection to gather the information that you most care about from across this website into one central location, giving you greater control over how you connect with your community.

eBooks and more
About the Library
Support the Library
City of Lewiston Home Page





What's Happening at
Lewiston City Library?

Library Hours

Monday - Thursday 10am to 7pm
Friday - Saturday 10am to 5pm



















 Family Storytimes, Teen Events & Adult Programs!
Visit the Library's calendar for details on upcoming events


eBooks, Digital Audiobooks, Music and Video Streaming!
Accessible 24/7 the Library offers ebooks, digital audiobooks, video streaming and music online. Just login with your library card! Kanopy requires the patron to make an account, then put in the library card.
                




        
Ways to Support Your Library
Community support helps keep your library thriving! Learn how you can support your library just by searching the internet! Learn more at Other Ways to Support.
